metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37290 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GNOME Nautilus 42.2 allows a NULL pointer dereference and get_basename application crash via a pasted ZIP archive.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-37290` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-nautilus-4.0 - 1:43.0-1ubuntu2.1
libnautilus-extension4 - 1:43.0-1ubuntu2.1
nautilus - 1:43.0-1ubuntu2.1
nautilus-data - 1:43.0-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: caja package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
nautilus package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:43.0-1ubuntu2.1').
nemo package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
